name: Legend of the Three Amulets
description:
Made for One Game a Month Game Jam - October 2016

This is a 2D Platformer Set in Egypt. You Play as an archeologist attempting to solve the ancient mysteries of the Pyramids of Giza. Armed only with a shovel, he digs his way through the sand, to discover the three amulets that will activate the Statue.

Movement - WASD or arrow keys
Space to jump

mouse to aim shovel and right click to dig.

Touch the Statue on the Far right surface level to deposit the amulets

You can deliver each amulet one at a time or multiple at once.

Music Credit

"8bit Dungeon Level" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
